layout.title: Roldan Studio - Freelance Web Designer & Developer
layout.description: Boost your business with fast, optimized websites with no monthly fees and visible results. Clean design, real performance.

hero.title: Hi! I'm Javi
hero.subtitle: As developer & designer, I build high-performance websites that boost sales.

static.title: Static Marketing Site
static.subtitle: The best option for simple sites that don't need monthly changes.
outcomesList: I handle updates on request. You don't touch code.
Integrated booking system with calendar sync.
Option to upgrade later to a dynamic site.

dynamic.title: Dynamic Marketing Site
dynamic.subtitle: Perfect for sites that require continuous changes or small stores.
outcomesList: Update and edit the content yourself.
Keep all your content organized in one database.
Integrated booking system with calendar sync.
Add a blog or pages showcasing your work.

custom.title: Custom Web App
custom.subtitle: For development of complex web applications or big ecommerce sites.
outcomesList: Full control of features, logic, and integrations.
Scales to thousands of products, users, or data points.
Secure infrastructure with auth, payments, and APIs.
Custom workflows and dashboards for your team.
